meanings.definition: The quality or state of being oafish.
meanings.sent1: His oafishness was evident in the way he tripped over his own feet.
meanings.sent2: Her oafishness made her stand out in a crowd of graceful dancers.
meanings.sent3: Despite his oafishness, he always managed to bring a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The oafishness of the giant in the story added a comedic touch to the plot.
meanings.sent5: The oafishness of the puppy as it tried to catch its tail was endearing.

meanings.definition: The behavior or characteristics of an oaf.
meanings.sent1: His oafishness in social situations often led to awkward moments.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't help but laugh at the oafishness of his attempts to impress her.
meanings.sent3: The oafishness of the clown at the party had everyone in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her boss's oafishness in handling delicate matters caused many problems.
meanings.sent5: The oafishness of the knight in shining armor was a refreshing change from the usual hero.

meanings.definition: Clumsiness or awkwardness in manner or behavior.
meanings.sent1: The oafishness of his movements made it clear he was not a dancer.
meanings.sent2: Despite her oafishness, she always managed to get the job done.
meanings.sent3: The oafishness of the waiter as he spilled drinks on the customers was comical.
meanings.sent4: His oafishness in handling delicate objects often resulted in accidents.
meanings.sent5: The oafishness of the toddler as he tried to walk for the first time was adorable.
